SELECT t.id AS teamId, t.shop_id AS shopId, s.cover_img AS shopImg, s.name AS shopName, s.address AS shopAddress, t.start_time AS startTime, t.number AS personNum FROM ( SELECT * FROM team WHERE id IN ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT t.id,t.`number`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_users WHERE team_id =t.id AND STATUS = 0) AS joinNum FROM team t LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tu.team_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id ) a WHERE 1=1
and a.number <= (a.joinNum * 2)
and a.number > (a.joinNum * 2)
) AND id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT team_id FROM team_users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND STATUS = 0) ) t LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = t.shop_id WHERE t.status = 0 AND t.result = 0 AND t.start_time > NOW()
